short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get RottenTomatoes and IMDb ratings on your netflix account. Just plug and play.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get realtime IMDb and RottenTomatoes ratings for all titles available in netflix. Start binging the high rated shows. Click on the rating to open IMDb and RottenTomatoes website for more details. 

The permissions are read only from imdb and rotten tomatoes. We paste the ratings onto the netflix page. We do not send your data anywhere. It stays just on your desktop.
